data.text: @CdcTraffic Hi, yes the slider is set to the minimum bid. You can find more details about our bid upgrades here: https://t.co/4Yi1XyMACJ Kind regards, Lyndsay

@chrisgooden123 Hi Chris, sorry about the inconvenience. Please send me your booking code in a private message, so I can assist you further.
Best regards, Shawn
@CheungCodie Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM and we'll take a look for you. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@RooAdrie Hi there, please send us your booking code in a DM - we will have a closer look. Kind regards, Funda
@itsririb Hi, please use the following link https://t.co/Yym3KbiPwQ to get further updates on your missing bag. Kind regards, James
@FrankMonaco20 [2/2] only our call center colleagues are authorized to take payment details from you. Please send us your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Christine

@FrankMonaco20 Hi Frank, [1/5] we regret to read that you are not able to reach us via phone. If the rebooking is possible free of charge we can complete it for you. However, as soon as a tax or fare difference applies,
@CdcTraffic Hi, we haven't heard of any irregularities at the moment. Kind regards, James

@SaraShariati_ (2/2) Austrian Airlines is an international company with employees and passengers in and from around the world, and we distance ourselves from racism. We will use your feedback as an opportunity to remind our employees of our commitment to high and friendly quality standards. Mae

@SaraShariati_ Dear Sara (1/2),
we understand your concern. Our employees are tasked with observing certain rules procedures – we would like to apologize if our colleague hasn’t found the right words or tone in this case. We would like to place emphasis on the following:
@itsririb Hi Vana, sorry to hear about this. Please contact the phone number on your lost baggage report to receive further updates. Kind regards, James

@ponifaax Hi Florian, we're sorry for the confusion. Austrian Airlines comply with the entry regulations specified by the respective national authorities. So these are the valid travel restrictions. Best regards, Christiane
@novakg11 @UnitedAirlines_ Hi Gary, please don't share your booking code publicly due to privacy reasons. Please write us a DM. Thank you! Kind regards, Christine
@MatthiasRousavy Hi Matthias, leider können wir dir hier nicht weiterhelfen. Bitte kontaktiere hierfür direkt unseren Internet Helpdesk unter ​+43 5 1766 3000. Liebe Grüße, Christine
@bzztook @rigoNcs Hi, what account are you referring to? Kind regards, James

@MattPerchick Hi, please fill out the following contact form https://t.co/Dewsdx6XOv Our respective colleagues will have a closer look at your request and you will be contacted asap. Kind regards, James
@rigoNcs Hi, we have already replied to your other message. Kind regards, James

@lijern There are fabric FFP2 masks. Maybe the flight attendant was wearing one of those? If you send us the exact flight details in a PM we can look into it. Kind regards, Lyndsay [2/2] https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

data.text: @lijern Hi, FFP2 masks are currently required on all flights to and from Austria. It is the passenger's responsibility to ensure they have the correct mask as communicated on our website and in e-mail correspondence. [1/2] https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@itscamomille_ Hi, we're really sorry for that. We've just forwarded your feedback to the station management to remind our team of our high-quality service standards. Best regards, Christiane

@daza85 Hi, airlines always have to comply with the rules of the countries they are flying to and from. You can find information about all regulations when traveling to the US here. The mask can be removed whilst eating and drinking. Kind regards, Lyndsay

data.text: @70sghostchild Hi, you can also purchase it by phone. Please call therefore one of our Customer Service Centers. The worldwide phone numbers can be found here: https://t.co/6bcy4DjBko  Best regards, Christiane
@Daza85 Hi, we cannot tell you if or when the mask requirement will be lifted. As an Austrian company, we are also bound by the regulations of the Austrian government. Kind regards, Lyndsay

data.text:
Ready to snatch a fancy piece of aviation history? ✈️❤️
 
Together with #AURENA we are auctioning Eco Seats💺 from our B767-fleet & catering trolleys for a good cause! We will donate all proceeds to #NachbarInNot to support people in Ukraine! 🇺🇦
 
Bid now: https://t.co/9svyWZckpq https://t.co/Yf3v1X2iWa

data.text: @deboeristroef Hi Bart, it's not that hard to save the passport details, but due to date protection reasons, we're simply not allowed to save them. We're sincerely sorry for this inconvenience. Best regards, Christiane

@parthchawla01 @joybhattacharj @airvistara Hi,please note that all forgotten items are handed over to the Airport's Lost & Found department by the cleaning crew.
Kindly contact the lost property desk of the respective airport.Kind regards, Christine
@pdebakker1 [3/3] Our colleagues from the feedback department will contact you then as soon as possible. Kind regards, Christine

data.text: @pdebakker1 [2/3] stating that for temporary loss of baggage, 100% for hygienic articles and 50% for clothes that were bought in the meantime, will be indemnified. Please keep all receipts and sent it via the following link https://t.co/CLg72NQvuH.

data.text:
This summer, Austrian Airlines will be back in the air with its entire fleet and a 20% increased offer to European holiday destinations. COO Francesco Sciortino: "We are ready for take-off into a summer in full operation!" 

Our financial results: 👇https://t.co/KhgT3p9AkV 

3/3

"We are currently recording six-figure booking numbers every week for May & June as well as for the summer holidays. Summer holiday flights are already filling up & business travel is also on the rise again. This dynamic makes us very confident!", says CCO Michael Trestl. 

2/3

data.text:
Omicron restrictions & the sharp rise in fuel prices in the first months of the year again led to a negative result in Austrian Airlines' balance sheet for the traditionally weak first quarter. Since March, corona easings show the comeback of full planes & wanderlust. 

1/3 https://t.co/MaqhU9Rixe

data.text: @pdebakker1 [2/2] There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you.  Best regards, Shawn

@pdebakker1 [1/2] Hi Peter, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report.
@kirkmainprize Hi Kirk, I have just replied to your other posting.  Best regards, Shawn
@kirkmainprize Hi Kirk, I have just replied to your other posting.  Best regards, Shawn
@kirkmainprize Hi Kirk, sorry to read about this event en route. Would you mind sending us your booking details via DM, so we can assist you further?  Best regards, Shawn
@CdcTraffic Hi there, For a bid upgrade please enter the amount you want to pay using the slider and click "Continue". Kind regards, Chris
@bernardo_12 Hi Bernardo, we apologize for any inconvenience caused and will forward your feedback to the responsible colleagues. Kind regards, Chris
@AhmedAbdElnab Hi Ahmed, bitte sende uns deinen Buchungscode und deine neuen gewünschten Flugdaten in einer DM. Gerne sehen wir uns das einmal genauer an. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@AhmedAbdElnab [2/2] Ich kann dir versichern, dass wir in vollem Einsatz für dich da sind und wir alles tun, damit wir dir rasch wieder unser gewohntes Service bieten können.
Liebe Grüße, Sarah

@AhmedAbdElnab [1/2] Hallo Ahmed, es tut mir leid, dass du so lange warten musstest. Wir haben aktuell wieder sehr viele Anrufe. Derzeit benötigen unsere Fluggäste auch mehr Zeit für ihre Anliegen. Natürlich wollen wir uns auch für jeden Passagier die Zeit nehmen, die er braucht.

@cati28d Hi, please mind that online check-in is available 47 hours prior to your scheduled departure time. You can also tell us your booking code in a DM and we'll take a closer look. Kind regards, James
@N_Meijering Hi Norbert, we recommend being at the airport for at least 2-3 hours before your scheduled departure time. Kind regards, James

@mcramer84 Hi Michael, if your ticket includes luggage anyway, show your gold card at the counter to check in one extra piece analog to the class you are traveling in. Please send us your booking code and card number in a PM so we can add it to your booking? Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@matthiasrousavy Hi Matthias, flüssige Babynahrung, die für die Versorgung des Kindes an Bord benötigt wird, kann mitgenommen werden. Wir bitten dich dieses bei der Sicherheitskontrolle am Flughafen Wien separat vorzuweisen. Liebe Grüße, James

@Thetrut57789172 Hallo, es tut uns sehr leid. Wir werden dein Feedback selbstverständlich weiterleiten, damit das in Zukunft nicht mehr vorkommt. 
Liebe Grüße, Sarah

@KiaMoazami @lufthansa Hi, Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Best regards, Brigitte

data.text: @DKaddik Hi Daniel, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. Please feel free to seek reimbursement by submitting a claim here:https://t.co/DlPk2wk146 Kind regards, Chris

@Lou____salome Hi Lou, in addition to your item of hand luggage, you may also take one additional personal item with a maximum size of 40 x 30 x 10 cm into the cabin with you. This might be a handbag, a travel pouch or a laptop bag, for example. Kind regards, Funda

data.text: @mountains46 @simoncalder Hi Andrea, please send us your booking code in a DM, so we can have a closer look on your refund status. Thank you and kind regards, Sarah
@Gabe_Meneses Hi, it is possible to reserve seats but as a fee applies, please contact our call center to complete this.  Kind regards, Lyndsay

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @mountains46 @SimonCalder Hi Andrea, refunds have to be requested because once they have been carried out it is not possible to revert the process and rebook. If you haven't done so already, please fill in our online refund form: https://t.co/okNqjpHHEx Kind regards, Lyndsay
@AlexChromium Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay / Kind regards, Lyndsay
@KiaMoazami Hi, what exactly happened in Montreal? Please send us a DM. Thank you! Kind regards, Christine

data.text: @VanjaLukic5 Hi Vanja, yes a mask with type KN95 is allowed. We wish you a pleasant flight. Best regards, Brigitte

@gabe_meneses Hi, we regret to hear that you have difficulties to reach us. Due to the current situation our lines are busy, unfortunately. Is there anything we can assist you with? Kind regards, Sara
@hronicarka Dear Anja, please send us a PM with your booking code. Kind regards, Ivana https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@kozmakate Hi Kate, we are sorry to hear you were facing difficulties trying to contact us. Due to the current situation, all our channels are unfortunately very busy. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris

@steelersfan613 Hi there, kindly send an email to viellos@austrian.com 
Kind regards, Sara

data.text: @oe1ems Hi Emir, Solltest du deinen Fall noch nicht an unser Feedback Management geschickt haben, bitte mach das unter folgendem Link: https://t.co/iSWK3YnzlN  Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@steelersfan613 Hello there, we’re very sorry about the inconvenience during your journey. Please turn to the contact on your PIR – you’ve received the PIR at the Lost & Found counter at the airport, it is where all information about your case is collected. Kind regards, Ivana

data.text: @borislapouga Hi Boris, I'm sorry for the inconvenience caused. We have a lot of calls at the moment and therefore longer waiting times may occur. Please try our other numbers too. You can find our worldwide numbers via https://t.co/FFefe6Jqyt Kind regards, James

@MihriSin @FlySWISS Hi, yes meal service will be offered to and from Cairo Austrian Airlines flights. On our short-haul flights, no complimentary snacks will be offered. They can be purchased. Please contact SWISS directly for their flights. Thank you and kind regards, Sarah

data.text: @baharshoghi  Hi Bahar, you can also use our online form: https://t.co/6bcy4DjBko   Just select whether you want to rebook or request a refund. Please just do this before your scheduled time of departure. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@stormgrass Hi Richard, schicke uns bitte deine Buchungscode in eine PN und wir schauen uns das an. Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @davidelouya Hi, we're sorry for the disruption to your journey. Please fill in our online feedback form so that my colleagues can look into the matter: https://t.co/b0RCkhgTVX Kind regards, Lyndsay
@Matt48685948 Hi Matt, please send us your booking codes and the requested change in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@VivianMendonca3 Hi there, unfortunately, the free checked baggage is not applicable with an Economy Light fare. Kind regards, Ivana

@skyzebra Hi, we apologise for the disruption to your journey. Please fill in our online feedback form if you haven't done so already and my colleagues will look in to the matter for you: https://t.co/duUzSc3SBX Kind regards, Lyndsay
@OliverNeilson Hi there, please send us a PM with your booking code. Kind regards, Ivana https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@jitskeveenhoven Hi Jitske, we have replied to your Facebook message. Kind regards, Lyndsay

data.text: @WannaBLikeJLo Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM so that we are able to assist you! Kind regards, Christine

@yasilios_ Hi, for lost and found items at Vienna Airport or an incoming flight to Vienna please contact our colleagues at the lost property office directly: https://t.co/fOV6brfkrl  - best regards, Brigitte
@yasilios_ Hi, how can we help you? Kind regards, Lyndsay

@suzannevautier Hi, our call center is currently receiving an unprecedented amount of calls. Please send us your booking code via PM so we can take a look for you. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@driloni Hi, do you already have a booking? Please send us your booking code via PM and what your request is. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@labeatkuci Hi, in order to assist you, please send us your booking code in a DM. Thank you! Kind regards, Christine
@saz_jan Hi Solmaz, we already replied to your DM. Kind regards, Chris

@zielina Hi Anita, es tut uns leid, dass du Schwierigkeiten hattest mit uns in Kontakt zu treten. Bitte sende und deinen Buchungscode und deine neuen gewünschten Flugdaten in einer DM damit wir uns das genauer ansehen können. Freundliche Grüße, Chris
@awaken_11_11 Hi there, please send your request to our colleagues via specialcases@austrian.com Kind regards, Chris
@RebekaK19 Hi Rebeka, please send us your booking code in a DM, with the exact flights that you saw, so we can investigate. Thank you and kind regards, Sarah
@RebekaK19 Hi Rebeka, please tell us which flights you were checking? (date and flight numbers) Kind regards, Sarah

@jok19887 Hi, we currently have a lot of calls again. At the moment, our passengers also need more time for their concerns. Of course, we also want to take the time that each passenger needs. What is your concern about? Please send us a DM. Best regards, Brigitte
@mikaelspersson Hi, we regret to hear that you have difficulties to reach us. Due to the current situation our lines are pretty busy. Please send us your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Sara
@mjrlala Hi Mjr. Lala, thank you for your feedback. We will send it to the respective department for further investigation. Kind regards, Christine
@shewe78 Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM so that we can have a closer look. Kind regards, Christine
@MlleLauForero Hi Lau, thank you for reaching out. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll take a closer look into it. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@FindingxMichi Hi Michi, leider kann das Ticket auf eine andere Person nicht übertragen werden. Liebe Grüße, Derya

@hopesandhypes Hallo Bjoern, es tut uns leid, dass du unser Kundenservice-Center nicht erreichen konntest. Wir erleben derzeit einen starken Anstieg des Anrufaufkommens und daher kann es zu längeren Wartezeiten kommen. Bitte teile uns den Buchungscode und dein Anliegen in einer DM mit.LG, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@originalpk Hi there, thank you for reaching out. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly take a closer look into it. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@ArthurBiard Hi there, thank you for reaching out. I am sorry to hear that you had to wait so long. We currently have a lot of calls again. Please send us your inquiry in a DM. We´ll gladly check whether we can also be of help. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
